text: Despise: Each player discards a creature or planeswalker card from their hand
Mire in Misery: Each player sacrifices a creature or enchantment
Karma: Each player takes damage equal to the amount of swamps in play
Bargain: One player draws a card, Angel of Death gains 7 life
Agonizing Syphon: Deals 3 damage to each player or a target that player controls, Angel of Death gains 3 life.
Allied Reinforcements: place two 2/2 white knight defender tokens in front of Angel of Death
Arms of Hadar: Each player`s creatures get -2/-2 until end of turn
Angelic Edict: Each player exiles a creature or enchantment
Assassinate: Each player destroys a tapped creature they control
Blinding Light: Tap all nonwhite creatures
Ancient Craving: Each player draws 3 cards and loses 3 life
